entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
